gmd:metadataStandardName.gco:CharacterString: ISO 19115-2 Geographic Information - Metadata - Part 2: Extensions for Imagery and Gridded Data

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Global Positioning System (GPS) Energetic Particle Data

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: Intelligence and Space Research Division, Global Security Directorate, Los Alamos National Laboratory

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: Energetic particle data from the CXD and BDD instrument on the GPS constellation are available to the space weather research community. The release of these data supports the National Space Weather Action Plan which was recently published by the Executive Office of the President's National Science and Technology Council (NSTC).

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: Access to these data to assess is being provided in response to cited goal of the NSTC to "Establish and Sustain a Baseline Observational Capability for Space-Weather Operations."

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: Data access provided by the NOAA Solar and Terrestrial Physics Branch.

gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCEI > National Centers for Environmental Information, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce

gmd:fileDescription.gco:CharacterString: Image for the GPS constellation (from GPS.gov).

gmd:otherConstraints.gco:CharacterString: Distribution Liability: While every effort has been made to ensure that these data are accurate and reliable within the limits of the current state of the art, NOAA cannot assume liability for any damages caused by any errors or omissions in the data, nor as a result of the failure of the data to function on a particular system. NOAA makes no warranty, expressed or implied, nor does the fact of distribution constitute such a warranty.

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: NOAA created the National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) by merging NOAA's National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC), and National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC), including the National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC), per the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015, Public Law 113-235. NCEI launched publicly on April 22, 2015.

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: Data provided by the Intelligence and Space Research Division, Global Security Directorate, Los Alamos National Laboratory

gmd:dataset.gco:CharacterString: These metadata will be updated as needed and reviewed at least annually.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: This metadata was generated by NCEI Solar Terrestrial Physics Branch.
This record was automatically modified on 2015-10-02 to include references to NCEI where applicable.
